issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: For example if during the building of the binaries for BlackBerry there is a compile or link fail that prevents the creation of the tibb.lib binary then do not include the blackberry folder/platform in the CI build. This will make it easier for QA to know they are working with the latest build.
fields.summary: If a platform build fails do not include the target platform in the CI Titanium SDK build

comments.body: Not only is this a bad idea, BlackBerry is dead.
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
